title: Vivaldi 5.1 adds tab scrolling and reading list on desktop, new themes on Android
content:
Vivaldi has updated its productivity-focused web browser to version 5.1 on both Android and desktop devices. For desktop users, the update includes horizontal scrolling for tabs, a reading list feature, and a quick settings panel. Android users can count on new customization options and more speed.
